radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffusely dilated loops of fluid-filled small and large bowel with mucosal hyperemia and bowel-wall thickening. No transition point identified to suggest mechanical bowel obstruction. Marked atherosclerotic calcification of the abdominal aorta. Chronic non-united left pelvic fracture through which a loop of large bowel had herniated, without evidence of strangulation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings on CT performed during the second admission are unchanged.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased linear opacities in the lungs.
